awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 23 wins & 28 nominations.

fullplot: Attack the Block follows an unlucky young woman and and a gang of tough inner-city kids who make an unlikely alliance to try to defend their turf against an invasion of savage alien creatures, turning a South London apartment complex into a war-zone.
plot: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.
title: Attack the Block

tomatoes.consensus: Effortlessly mixing scares, laughs, and social commentary, Attack the Block is a thrilling, brisky-paced sci-fi yarn with a distinctly British flavor.
